body:
@paszczus thanks a lot for reporting issues back to us!

we need some more information to properly support you with your issue!

can i ask you to follow our guidelines for submitting bugs as described here: https://github.com/owncloud/core/blob/master/contributing.md

thanks a lot!

ok, sorry ;)

this is problem with sharing folders and files syncing.

### expected behaviour
all shared files should be accessible.
all files from local disk should be synced to owncloud.

### actual behaviour
not all files are syncing from local disk to owncloud.
not all files are shared with users.

### steps to reproduce
1. create directory: 2013 marcin\kpz/kpz 8-2013-a szkå‚o i drobny sprzä™t lab
2. upload file called: "lista osã“b obecnych przy otwarciu ofert kpz 8-2013-a.docx"
3. try to share that file
4. check logs

### server configuration
operating system: linux

web server: apache 2.4.7

database: mysql 5.6.14

php version: 5.3.27

owncloud version: 6.0 (git@stable6)

updated from an older owncloud or fresh install: updated from 5.0.13@stable5

list of activated app: 
- calendar
- deleted files
- documents
- encryption
- image viewer
- ldap user and group backend
- owncloud depdencies info
- pictures
- share files
- text editor
- versions

the content of config/config.php: (without the database password and passwordsalt)

  'instanceid' => '51ee35eff2f26',
  'datadirectory' => '/var/lib/owncloud/',
  'passwordsalt' => 'fooo',
  'dbtype' => 'mysql',
  'version' => '6.0.0.13',
  'dbname' => 'owncloud',
  'dbhost' => 'localhost',
  'dbtableprefix' => 'oc_',
  'dbuser' => 'owncloud',
  'dbpassword' => 'foo',
  'installed' => true,
  'maxzipinputsize' => 2147483648,
  'allowzipdownload' => true,
  'ldapignorenamingrules' => false,
  'loglevel' => '0',
  'mail_smtpdebug' => true,
  'mail_smtpmode' => 'smtp',
  'mail_smtphost' => 'smtp.foo.bar.pl',
  'mail_smtpport' => 25,
  'mail_smtptimeout' => 10,
  'mail_smtpsecure' => '',
  'mail_smtpauth' => false,
  'mail_smtpauthtype' => 'login',
  'mail_smtpname' => '',
  'mail_smtppassword' => '',
  'maintenance' => false,
  'forcessl' => true,
  'default_language' => 'pl',
);

### client configuration
browser: firefox 25.0.1

operating system: linux

### logs

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
